definition: to hand in/to hand over/to seize

sentences.english: Under the budget proposal, hedge-fund managers would be taxed at higher rates.
sentences.chinese: 根据预算方案，对冲基金经理将按更高的税率缴税。

sentences.english: Take your pa ort, please. Have you anything dutiable ?
sentences.chinese: 请把护照拿去。有应缴税的东西吗？

sentences.english: Goods and services are traded for fiat money due to the need to pay taxes in the money.
sentences.chinese: 用货物和服务来换不兑换纸币是因为用钱缴税的需要。

sentences.english: You only did it so you’d have one more poor sucker to tax.
sentences.chinese: 你这样做的目的只是为了增加一个向你缴税的可怜虫。

sentences.english: Applicants should provide evidence that the earned income has been declared for tax purposes.
sentences.chinese: 申请人们提供工资劳动所得必须是已经声明去缴税的。

sentences.english: Should we pay property tax on our company-owned office buildings?
sentences.chinese: 我公司的自有办公房要缴税吗？

sentences.english: The reason for this decision was a tax on vegetables but not fruit.
sentences.chinese: 这个决定的原因是蔬菜要缴税，而水果则不用。

sentences.english: Nicola, if you didn't think you'd get caught, would you pay your taxes?
sentences.chinese: 妮可拉，假如不会被抓，你还会缴税吗？

sentences.english: The tax authorities have been harrying her for repayment.
sentences.chinese: 税务当局不断逼她缴税。

sentences.english: The quantities of taxed and untaxed salt were about equa1.
sentences.chinese: 缴过税的官盐与未缴税的私盐，两者数量大致相等。

sentences.english: But the number of people actually paying tax grew by less than 5%.
sentences.chinese: 但是，有多少人实际上缴税季成长率不到百分之五。

sentences.english: All the articles listed here are dutiable.
sentences.chinese: 这儿所列的物品都要缴税。

sentences.english: And moves to raise taxes for Big Oil will likely spark White House veto threats.
sentences.chinese: 而提高石油巨擎缴税金额的举动又可能被白宫否决。

sentences.english: Take your passport, please. Have you anything dutiable ?
sentences.chinese: 请把护照拿去。有应缴税的东西吗？

definition: to file an income tax return/to declare dutiable goods (at customs)
personal income tax (abbr. for 個人所得稅|个人所得税)
to pay a tax one has evaded/to pay an overdue tax
